div.title: Advertisement
div.style: border: none; height: 0px; width: 300px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; position: relative; visibility: visible; background-color: transparent; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; opacity: 0;

iframe.name: aswift_1
iframe.style: left: 0px; position: absolute; top: 0px; border: 0px; width: 300px; height: 0px;
iframe.sandbox: allow-forms allow-popups allow-popups-to-escape-sandbox allow-same-origin allow-scripts allow-top-navigation-by-user-activation
